greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: g.f. for row n is Product( (x^i-x^(r+1))/(1-x^i), i = 1..r-2).
maple: f2:=r->mul( (x^i-x^(r+1))/(1-x^i), i = 1..r-2); for r from 1 to 10 do series(f2(r),x,50); od:
xref: If the initial zeros in each row are omitted, we get A008967.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 20 2005
